title: RITO PLS
body:
i was waiting in a rak game and the LOL kick me without have conection problem. That gave me a 20 minutes ban. Thanks a lot RIOT
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: it was my turn to pick in rank game when the luncher shut down...my internet conection was fine and no error masage...
Can you explain what you mean by kicked you out?  Where did this happen exactly?  Did you receive any error messages?  I'd like to help troubleshoot but need more details!  Let me know!
